expires.description: after this deadline the key is no longer valid

extensionDeadline.description: the key must be used by this time to remain valid

created_by.description: id of the user that created the grant

group.description: GroupID for a group being granted access

resource.description: a resource name in Infra's Universal Resource Notation

user.description: UserID for a user being granted access

wasCreated.description: Indicates that grant was successfully created, false it already existed beforehand

connected.description: Shows if the destination is currently connected

connection.description: Object that includes the URL and CA for the destination

kind.description: Kind of destination. eg. kubernetes or ssh or postgres

resources.description: Destination specific. For Kubernetes, it is the list of namespaces

items.description: Destination specific. For Kubernetes, it is the list of namespaces

roles.description: Destination specific. For Kubernetes, it is the list of cluster roles available on that cluster

items.description: Destination specific. For Kubernetes, it is the list of cluster roles available on that cluster

uniqueID.description: Unique ID generated by the connector

version.description: Application version of the connector for this destination

deviceCode.description: a code that a device will use to exchange for an access key after device login is approved

expiresIn.description: The number of seconds that this set of values is valid

interval.description: the number of seconds the device should wait between polling to see if the user has finished logging in

userCode.description: This is the text the user will enter at the Verification URI

verificationURI.description: This is the URL the user needs to enter into their browser to start logging in

status.description: can be one of pending, rejected, expired, confirmed

created_by.description: id of the user that created the grant

group.description: GroupID for a group being granted access

resource.description: a resource name in Infra's Universal Resource Notation

user.description: UserID for a user being granted access

count.description: Total number of items on the current page
